name: Wei Zhao 0033
content: Dr Wei Zhao | The University of Aberdeen Dr Wei Zhao Dr Wei ZhaoLecturer Accepting PhDs About Email Addresswei.zhao@abdn.ac.ukSchool/DepartmentSchool of Natural and Computing Sciences Personal Website Biography I am a researcher, a lecturer and a PI in NLP at the University of Aberdeen. I also teach a seminar course at Heidelberg University, Germany. Research Research Areas Accepting PhDs I am currently accepting PhDs in Computing Science. Please get in touch if you would like to discuss your research ideas further.
